I am 5'8 and 155 pds 36C, I bought the large and like it so much I purchased 7 different colors. The sleeves are long for my long arms and the bottom of the shirt allows me to tuck it into slacks or jeans or where it on the outside. They wash up nice in cold water and the fit is beautiful. You might not want this shirt if you do not want a form fitting top as it clings to your body in a good way. Fabric is really nice and these tops fold up really small for packing or storing. A great shirt for travel. I also wear mine to my gym work outs. Many compliments. I store mine in a basket. No need to iron. Can be dressed up or down. This is my all time favorite shirt. Great fit and look. Very happy and will continue to order new colors when they have them. I do not think you can go wrong with this one- It's a winner.

They are sexy, and you can adjust how much you want to show off or not. I liked the first I bought (and so did my DH) that I ended up with three: navy, red and purple. 评论概述: Cute but very clingy, even sizing up
评论详情: I have mixed feelings about this. I ordered one size up and it still fits just as tightly as on the model. I love the modern Asymmetrical design and nice sharp cut shoulders. It is decent quality, well-made. But it is so clingy. It really does show every single line of your bra. If you watch the video of the model, you can see how it’s clinging up underneath her bra and you can literally see the underwire. I just think that’s kind of tacky looking. So I’m frustrated that after sizing up it’s still that tight. Luckily the fabric isn’t super super thin, but it is very stretchy and slim cut so that makes it clingy.  I think in black, it might be OK. The sleeves are very long. I would say this is a slightly muted blue based forest green, kind of like an Eagles green.  It’s fairly close to the photos, just maybe a tiny bit brighter in person

评论概述: Nice sheen, soft sexy fit and feel
评论详情: This top can be dressed up or go casz. It has a nice sheen so it can make a statement in a work setting or a on a night out.  I'm 6 ft tall and the sleeves are long enough. I'd Love for them to be a little longer, but they're fine as they are. The cutout is such that it will still cover most bra straps.  Overall, the peek-a-boo at the neckline and chest is a really classy take on this year's one shoulder look.

This is a very cute top. I love the style. You can dress this up or down. Very versatile. Fits true to size. Very comfortable to wear. Perfect for the colder seasons. This is a great addition to my wardrobe.
